programme.title: Tension at Table Rock
programme.desc: An outlaw (Richard Egan) on the run helps a sheriff (Cameron Mitchell) keep order in a town overrun by cowboys.

programme.title: These Thousand Hills
programme.desc: A cowboy (Don Murray) tries for easy money with his partner, then tries ranching with a saloon hostess's (Lee Remick) money.

programme.title: The Left Handed Gun
programme.desc: Billy the Kid works for kindly rancher Tunstall until he is murdered by a corrupt lawman and his cronies. A distraught Billy goes on a violent rampage through the New Mexico Territory, and is finally brought down by his old cohort, Pat Garrett.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Pat sends away for a mail-order sweetheart who turns out to be beautiful Marcy Nevers, an Eastern widow with a young son.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A mysterious outlaw hijacks stolen loot from stagecoach bandits.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: When students become lawmen for a day, the new "sheriff's" uncle takes advantage.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy and Dale are caught between feuding cattlemen and homesteaders.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A new family in Paradise Valley mistakes outlaws for a welcoming committee.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A Southerner buys a wagon in which thieves hid money.

programme.title: Cole Younger, Gunfighter
programme.desc: A notorious outlaw (Frank Lovejoy) helps a cowboy (James Best) fight political corruption in 1873 Texas.

programme.title: The Night of the Grizzly
programme.desc: A lawman (Clint Walker) turns rancher with his wife (Martha Hyer) and family, facing a bad neighbor (Keenan Wynn) and a bear killing livestock.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: A banker unwittingly becomes Clay Kendall's partner in a fraud scheme.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Maude Sorel is suspected of being Julie Draton's mother.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Miners resent the Bella Union Hotel for catering to the upper crust.

programme.title: The Californians
programme.desc: Matt gets tipped off about gang that's shanghaiing sailors.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man (Richard Dix) falls for the daughter (Jane Wyatt) of a wagon freighter (Lee J. Cobb) who will not let him through.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The North Fork stagecoach must stop at the McCain ranch because of a severe snowstorm.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two cowhands submit Lucas' name to a matchmaker.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: Yancy becomes falsely accused of complicity in a waterfront property theft.

programme.title: Yancy Derringer
programme.desc: Yancy spends the holiday season searching for the murderer of his uncle Henry Spinner.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Longley must help a parolee and his daughter battle a family of outlaws who are trying to drive him off his ranch; they receive help from a pair of unlikely allies.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After the surrender at Appomattox, Longley and two of his junior officers agree to a reunion; five years later, the trio rendezvous and the sheriff suspects one of them of stealing an army-payroll.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Longley chases after Clay Thompson, a ruthless bounty hunter who is pursuit of a man falsely accused of bank robbery; Thompson doesn't believe The Texan when he explains the wanted posters are being retracted and continues his pursuit.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: When an outlaw gang robs the bank, Bill joins a posse to track them down; when the outlaws cross into Mexico, the sheriff and his men return home, but Bill crosses the border to avenge the deaths of a mother and daughter.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: An actor/cardsharp who cleaned out two men in poker is set up as the fall guy for an ambush on Bill; the payroll he was delivering is stolen.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Though reluctant at first, Bill accepts the job to become his old friend Sheriff Ben Tildy's deputy; several deputies before him had been killed by two ruthless men taking over the town, and the residents blame Tildy for their deaths.

programme.title: Fort Osage
programme.desc: A scout (Rod Cameron) leads a wagon train through territory made hostile by a violated treaty.
